attributes.action: initiate a greater control over alleged Psychics, Mediums and other persons claiming similar abilities, and implement scientific testing on behalf of the consumer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition Her Majesty’s government to initiate an accreditation scheme for Mediums, Psychics, Spiritualists and other paranormal practitioners, which would determine whether an individual truly exhibits abilities inexplicable in terms of scientific laws
We ask to raise this petition in recognition that many psychic practitioners charge substantial sums of money for their services to an often vulnerable customer base. It is noted that the Office of Fair Trading deems false psychic readings to be a major area of fraudulent activity earning £140 million per annum. 
We request the creation of testing centres to assess individual’s claimed abilities are either paranormal or can be explained in mundane terms. Those passing such an assessment would be issued a licence, legally permitting them to commercially offer their services as a practitioner. This document, however, should acknowledge that even apparently authentic psychic abilities are neither precise nor predictable.
